articles.title: Austrian Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung formed
articles.content:
Austrian Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung formed 
   Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A Committee for Remembering  President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Vienna on May 22.
 At the inaugural ceremony Max Verworner, chairman of the society for the promotion of the relations between Austria and the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee.    
 The committee discussed a program of different functions to be held in the capital city and local areas.

articles.title: Korea's reunification supported
articles.content:
Korea's reunification supported 
    Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Slovak President Rudolf Schuster, when receiving credentials from new DPRK ambassador to his country Pak Hyon Bo on May 23, said that Slovakia expresses full support to the Korean people in their efforts for peace on the Korean Peninsula and its reunification.
 Referring to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries, the president stressed that the two countries have good experience in having supported and cooperated with each other in the international arena including the U.N.
